content.text: I am doing great! Just graduated college with a degree in education, so I am pretty excited about my future.
That's awesome! Congratulations! My mom is a teacher too.
Thanks! I am looking forward to starting my career. What do you do for work?
I work as a meeting coordinator. It's a lot of fun but can be stressful at times.
I can imagine. Do you like it?
I do! It's a great way to meet new people and learn about different businesses.
That's what I love about working with kids. I get to learn something new every day.
That sounds really rewarding. I'm sure you'll be a great teacher.
Thanks! I'm excited to get started!
I'm sure you'll do great. What are your plans for after graduation?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about getting a job in the public school system, but I'm still open to other options.
That's great! I'm sure you'll find something you love.
